question: Which Union Ministry has launched ‘e-Dharti Geo portal’?
option1: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Union Housing and Urban Affairs Minister Hardeep Singh Puri has recently launched the ‘e-Dharti Geo Portal’.
The portal aims to integrate legacy drawings such as maps and lease plans in the management information system named e-Dharti and make it a geographic information system (GIS)-enabled system.
